summaries: Kelly Somers: It was a double transfer that I wasn't planning, but I got Joao Pedro in.
Sam Bonfield: Joao Pedro was heavily bought in last game week, but he missed out through injury.
Kelly Somers: I thought he would play a bit more in midfield, but he didn't deliver.
Julien Laurens: Havertz played between being a proper nine and an underguard role.
Kelly Somers: We were intrigued to see how Salah would perform against Bournemouth.
Sam Bonfield: If I had Salah, I definitely would have captained him this week.
Julien Laurens: Haaland is non-negotiable in your team and a trusted option this week.
Sam Bonfield: It's hard to call the captaincy for Haaland this week due to the fixture against Arsenal.
Sam Bonfield: Vardy is an interesting option with upcoming fixtures.
Julien Laurens: Vardy could capitalize on Leicester's favorable run of fixtures.
Sam Bonfield: I think Ollie Watkins is a great fit for the squad.
Julien Laurens: If fit, I think Watkins is a solid choice as well due to his form.
Sam Bonfield: Dominic Calvert-Lewin has been scoring despite Everton's struggles.
Julien Laurens: I'm not sure about Calvert-Lewin in the long-term though.
Sam Bonfield: I really like Liam Delap as a budget option this week.
Sam Bonfield: He's created chances and is top for expected goals at Ipswich.
Sam Bonfield: Mateta could be a good choice given his share of penalty responsibility.
Julien Laurens: Mateta could score as Brighton continues to create chances.
Sam Bonfield: When you look at the midfield from Spurs, it's quite difficult to find space for a Spurs player.
Sam Bonfield: I think if you did want a Spurs attacker, Kulisiewski made the biggest difference when he came on.
Sam Bonfield: I'm looking at Isak and kinda can't decide if he'll be fit for the weekend due to his eye injury.
Julien Laurens: His form looked better despite not scoring last week.
Julien Laurens: I brought Nico Jackson in because the Chelsea fixtures are still good, but I am cautious about his consistency.
Julien Laurens: After bringing him in, I am now worried because his playtime is uncertain.
Julien Laurens: Rashford is slowly getting back to form, and I think he can score again soon.
Sam Bonfield: He might be risky now, but if he gets the momentum back, he could be valuable.
